item.title: ğŸ“½ï¸ The influence of internet videos on my path to indie hacking
item.description: In autumn 2019 I started thinking about different product ideas and noticed all talk and no walk will not get me anywhere. That is when I started learning about building products and how to actually create things for the web. I started out learning as much as I can about all kinds of things like NoCode Tools, UX, UI, read books and enrolled in all kinds of online classes, communites, forums, subreddits and, of course, Youtube rabbit holes.

item.title: ğŸš€ One Micro Start Up Per Month #1
item.description: Note: The initial version was sent out to my newsletter recipients on the 31std of January 2021. This version has some slight adjustements. Welcome to the first issue of ğŸš€ One Micro Startup Per Month The last weeks have been quite an adventurous ride for me. On the day I launched my January product I had a power cut in my house. Yeah, a real one. Didn’t charge my laptop over night - 30% battery.
